sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class Quiz extends React.Component { state = { title: '', description: '', spring: false, summer: false, autumn: false, winter: false, activity: false, entertainment: false, foodAndDrink: false, sightSeeing: false, morning: false, afternoon: false, evening: false, night: false, free: false, cheap: false, mid: false, expensive: false, posts: [] }; componentDidMount = () => { this.getBlogPost(); }; handleChange(event) { const target = event.target; const value = target.type === 'checkbox' ? target.checked : target.value; const name = target.name; this.setState({ [name]: value }); } getBlogPost = () => { axios.get('/api/') .then((response) => { const data = response.data; this.setState({ posts: data }); console.log('Data has been received!!'); }) .catch(() => { alert('Error retrieving data!!!'); }); } submit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const payload = { title: this.state.title, description: this.state.description, spring: this.state.spring, summer: this.state.summer, autumn: this.state.autumn, winter: this.state.winter, activity: this.state.activity, entertainment: this.state.entertainment, foodAndDrink: this.state.foodAndDrink, sightSeeing: this.state.sightSeeing, morning: this.state.morning, afternoon: this.state.afternoon, evening: this.state.evening, night: this.state.night, free: this.state.free, cheap: this.state.cheap, mid: this.state.mid, expensive: this.state.expensive }; axios({ url: '/api/match', method: 'POST', data: payload }) .then((response) => { const data = response.data; this.setState({ posts: data }); console.log('Data has been received!!'); }) .catch(() => { console.log('Internal server error'); });; }; resetUserInputs = () => { this.setState({ title: '', description: '', spring: false, summer: false, autumn: false, winter: false, activity: false, entertainment: false, foodAndDrink: false, sightSeeing: false, morning: false, afternoon: false, evening: false, night: false, free: false, cheap: false, mid: false, expensive: false }); }; displayBlogPost = (posts) => { if (!posts.length) return null; return posts.map((post, index) => (

{post.title}

{post.description}

)); }; render() { console.log('State: ', this.state); //JSX return(

Tick all that suit in this questionaire

What time of the year is it?

What are you interested in doing?

What time of the day are you going?

What price range are you looking for?

Try these outings

{this.displayBlogPost(this.state.posts)}
); } } export default Quiz;
